text: Kaine Parker, also known as the Scarlet Spider, is a major character in the Spider-Man franchise and appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. He was created by Terry Kavanagh and Steven Butler, and first appeared in Web of Spider-Man #119 in October of 1994. == Fictional character biography == He was the first clone of Peter Parker created by the mad scientist Miles Warren (also known as the Jackal), but suffered deformities until he was cured and became the second Scarlet Spider to atone for his sins. == In other media == Kaine Parker/Scarlet Spider made his cinematic debut in the 2023 feature movie Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Kaine Parker
